languages.text: "Славно, {name}. Поверь, ты никогда не смог бы обречь ее на худшую участь, чем я приготовил для нее. Теперь же, когда этот договор заключен..." {n}Маражай с хлопком возвращает пластину на место.{/n} "Мы оба можем идти".

"Good, {name}. Know that you could never doom her to a worse fate than the one I have prepared for her. Now that this conversation is concluded..." {n}Marazhai slaps the plate back into position.{/n} "We can both be on our way."
languages.original_text: "Славно, {name}. Поверь, ты никогда не смог бы обречь ее на худшую участь, чем я приготовил для нее. Теперь же, когда этот договор заключен..." {n}Маражай с хлопком возвращает пластину на место.{/n} "Мы оба можем идти".

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Good, {name}. Know that you could never doom her to a worse fate than the one I have prepared for her. Now that this conversation is concluded..." {n}Marazhai slaps the plate back into position.{/n} "We can both be on our way."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “很好，{name}。你要清楚，无论你打算让她落得怎样的下场，都不会比我为她准备好的命运更加恐怖。既然这场谈话已经结束了……”{n}玛拉斋将护甲板放了回去。{/n}“我们可以出发了。”
languages.original_text: "Good, {name}. Know that you could never doom her to a worse fate than the one I have prepared for her. Now that this conversation is concluded..." {n}Marazhai slaps the plate back into position.{/n} "We can both be on our way."

traits.locale_text: “很好，{name}。你要清楚，无论你打算让她落得怎样的下场，都不会比我为她准备好的命运更加恐怖。既然这场谈话已经结束了……”{n}玛拉斋将护甲板放了回去。{/n}“我们可以出发了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「いい子だ、{name}。お前よりも俺がアイツに最悪の結末を用意している、それだけは覚えておけ。これでこの話は終わりだ…」{n}マラズハイはプレートを叩いて元の位置に戻した。{/n}「もう出発できるな」
languages.original_text: "Good, {name}. Know that you could never doom her to a worse fate than the one I have prepared for her. Now that this conversation is concluded..." {n}Marazhai slaps the plate back into position.{/n} "We can both be on our way."

traits.locale_text: 「いい子だ、{name}。お前よりも俺がアイツに最悪の結末を用意している、それだけは覚えておけ。これでこの話は終わりだ…」{n}マラズハイはプレートを叩いて元の位置に戻した。{/n}「もう出発できるな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Bien, {name}. Has de saber que no podrías haberla condenado a un destino peor que el que le tengo reservado. Y ahora que esta conversación ha concluido...». {n}Marazhai vuelve a encajar la placa en su sitio.{/n} «Los dos podemos seguir con nuestras cosas».
languages.original_text: "Good, {name}. Know that you could never doom her to a worse fate than the one I have prepared for her. Now that this conversation is concluded..." {n}Marazhai slaps the plate back into position.{/n} "We can both be on our way."

traits.locale_text: «Bien, {name}. Has de saber que no podrías haberla condenado a un destino peor que el que le tengo reservado. Y ahora que esta conversación ha concluido...». {n}Marazhai vuelve a encajar la placa en su sitio.{/n} «Los dos podemos seguir con nuestras cosas».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Marché conclu, {name}. Sachez que vous ne sauriez la condamner à un sort plus funeste que celui que je lui réserve. Sur ce, le sujet est clos. Nous n'avons plus qu'à reprendre notre route, » {n}termine Marazhai en remettant la plaque d'armure en place.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Good, {name}. Know that you could never doom her to a worse fate than the one I have prepared for her. Now that this conversation is concluded..." {n}Marazhai slaps the plate back into position.{/n} "We can both be on our way."

traits.locale_text: « Marché conclu, {name}. Sachez que vous ne sauriez la condamner à un sort plus funeste que celui que je lui réserve. Sur ce, le sujet est clos. Nous n'avons plus qu'à reprendre notre route, » {n}termine Marazhai en remettant la plaque d'armure en place.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Gut, {name}. Euch sei gesagt, dass Ihr ihr niemals ein schlimmeres Schicksal bereiten könntet als das, was ich für sie vorgesehen habe. Da dieses Gespräch nun beendet ist ..." {n}Marazhai schlägt auf die Platte und sie rutscht wieder in Position.{/n} "Können wir beide wieder unseres Weges gehen."
languages.original_text: "Good, {name}. Know that you could never doom her to a worse fate than the one I have prepared for her. Now that this conversation is concluded..." {n}Marazhai slaps the plate back into position.{/n} "We can both be on our way."

traits.locale_text: "Gut, {name}. Euch sei gesagt, dass Ihr ihr niemals ein schlimmeres Schicksal bereiten könntet als das, was ich für sie vorgesehen habe. Da dieses Gespräch nun beendet ist ..." {n}Marazhai schlägt auf die Platte und sie rutscht wieder in Position.{/n} "Können wir beide wieder unseres Weges gehen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Good, . Know that you could never doom her to a worse fate than the one I have prepared for her. Now that this conversation is concluded..." {n}Marazhai slaps the plate back into position.{/n} "We can both be on our way."

languages.text: "İyi o hâlde {name}. Onu kendisi için hazırladığımdan daha kötü bir kadere mahkûm edemeyeceğini bilmeni isterim. Şimdi... Bu konuşma da sonlandığına göre..." {n}Marazhai, plakayı yerine oturtuyor.{/n} "İkimiz de yolumuza gidebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "Good, {name}. Know that you could never doom her to a worse fate than the one I have prepared for her. Now that this conversation is concluded..." {n}Marazhai slaps the plate back into position.{/n} "We can both be on our way."

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
